full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 195 of 262 1906
LC8VMAX6 Rodgers - cross
1 actors and other types of artists, right?
2 A. Correct.
3 Q. And those people, those artists, are in high school for this camp, right?
4 A. Yes.
5 Q. Okay. And it's pretty well known in the arts community, the Interlochen Arts Camp; isn't that right?
6 A. Correct.
7 Q. Now, you testified, I believe, that from 1991, when you first started working for Mr. Epstein, to 1998, you flew to Interlochen once a year roughly, right?
8 A. Yes.
9 Q. And you did that typically in the month of August, right?
10 A. Yes.
11 Q. I think you mentioned there may have been one year where you went July 31st, right at the end of July; but other than that, it was August, right?
12 A. Correct.
13 Q. And Mr. Epstein, I think you're aware that he had a cabin at Interlochen, right?
14 A. Yes. I believe it was referred to as a lodge.
15 Q. A lodge?
16 A. Yes.
17 Q. But he had the ability to stay in that lodge if he wanted to, right?
18 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00019057
